author: JanFSchulte
body: Update the tag for RecoTracker-FinalTrackSelectors to complete backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36285 to CMSSW_12_1_X, which is done in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36327. This is needed to use the updated track DNN selection network file introduced in https://github.com/cms-data/RecoTracker-FinalTrackSelectors/pull/11 in CMSSW_12_1_X to match the version of mkFit that is also being backported to that release.
title: Update RecoTracker-FinalTrackSelectors tag (backport of #36285)
